articles.author: Boureima Balima
articles.title: Niger's citizens undaunted as deadline to reverse coup expires - Reuters
articles.description: Thousands of supporters of Niger's coup leaders flocked to a stadium in the capital Niamey on Sunday, apparently undaunted by the threat of military intervention from West Africa's regional bloc as its ultimatum to reinstate the president expires.
